message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I'm excited to discuss the details with you. I'm willing to offer you the product for $1100000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $1050000. This is a fair compromise considering the product's value to both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that. I'd be willing to pay $950000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I understand your persistence, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $950000. I'm willing to make a slight adjustment and offer the product for $1030000. This is a reasonable compromise considering the product's value to both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to make a slight adjustment, but I'm still not willing to pay $1030000. I'd be willing to pay $980000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I understand your persistence, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $980000. I'm willing to make another slight adjustment and offer the product for $1020000. This is a reasonable compromise considering the product's value to both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to make another adjustment, but I'm still not willing to pay $1020000. I'd be willing to pay $990000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I understand your persistence, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $990000. I'm willing to make one more slight adjustment and offer the product for $1015000. This is a reasonable compromise considering the product's value to both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to make one more adjustment, but I'm still not willing to pay $1015000. I'd be willing to pay $990000 for the product, and that's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider buying the product from John for $1000000.
